player

Class GameTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.GameTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class GameTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A class that implements a game tree using Alpha-Beta pruning.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameTree

        public GameTree(<any> graph,
                PageRank pageRank,
                Dijkstra dijkstra,
                int round,
                Colour initialPlayer,
                java.util.List<GamePlayer> initialState)
        Constructs a new GameTree object.
        Parameters:
        graph - the Graph associated with the game.
        pageRank - the PageRank object associated with the game.
        dijkstra - the Dijkstra object associated with the game.
        round - the current round of the game.
        initialPlayer - the current player in the game.
        initialState - the List of GamePlayer objects representing the current state of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • startTree

        public static GameTree.GameTreeHelper startTree(ThreadCommunicator threadCom,
                                                <any> graph,
                                                PageRank pageRank,
                                                Dijkstra dijkstra,
                                                int round,
                                                Colour initialPlayer,
                                                java.util.List<GamePlayer> initialState)
        Static function to create a GameTree and a GameTreeHelper and start the relevant threads.
        Parameters:
        threadCom - the ThreadCommunicator object to put the Moves on after an iteration of the game tree.
        graph - the Graph associated with the game.
        pageRank - the PageRank object associated with the game.
        dijkstra - the Dijkstra object associated with the game.
        round - the current round of the game.
        initialPlayer - the current player in the game.
        initialState - the List of GamePlayer objects representing the current state of the game.
        Returns:
        the new GameTreeHelper object.
